title: Systematic Language Curriculum Design for Critical Thinking (CT) Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language pedagogy and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Systematic Instructional Design for Developing Critical Thinking in Language Education Contexts for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply the First Principles of Instruction model in language education contexts to design CT-based lessons.
Learners can submit project outcomes demonstrating domain-specific (language) and general CT competencies with over 80% completeness.
Learners can derive three or more improvements for CT-integrated lesson design through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
